name: ink-storylet-framework
description: A simple storylet framework for Ink.

scripts.build: npm run build-browser && npm run build-node && npm run build-unity
scripts.dist: npm run build && rm -rf dist/v$npm_package_version && mkdir -p dist/v$npm_package_version && zip -r dist/v$npm_package_version/$npm_package_name-browser-v$npm_package_version.zip ./browser/build && zip -r dist/v$npm_package_version/$npm_package_name-node-v$npm_package_version.zip ./node/build && zip -r dist/v$npm_package_version/$npm_package_name-unity-v$npm_package_version.zip ./unity/build
